title: [Discussion] Internship in 7th SEMESTER
content: How advisable is it to do an Internship in the 7th Semester, Also if we complete our Internship in the 7th Semester then do we get some extra credits?

comments.body: You dont get credits for 7th sem. Your supposed to focus on your capstone/placements)/masters prep
No, u wont get credits, do for experience and (money)
